description: Cabbage (Brassica oleracea Capitata Group) is an amazing plant species. It has a wide range of nutritional values, making it an excellent source of Vitamin A and C and minerals like Potassium, Calcium and Magnesium. It is also rich in dietary fiber and antioxidants which boosts your immune system and helps prevent the growth of cancerous cells. Furthermore, it is low in calories and helps you regulate your weight. Plus, its sweet and slightly bitter taste makes it a great ingredient for a variety of dishes. All in all, cabbage is an unbelievably versatile and nutritious plant species that can enhance both your health and diet.
